title: Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker, Portable Speaker with Microphone, Wireless Waterproof Speaker for Travel, Outdoor and Pool Use, Black
descriptions:
Introducing the Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker - the ultimate portable speaker for all your audio needs. This sleek and stylish speaker in black offers a multitude of features and characteristics that will enhance your listening experience. 

With its built-in microphone, this portable speaker is perfect for hands-free calling and voice commands. Whether you're traveling, enjoying the great outdoors, or relaxing by the pool, the Bose SoundLink Flex is designed to withstand any environment. Its IP67 waterproof rating ensures that it can handle water, dust, shocks, and even UV light. It even floats on water, so you don't have to worry about losing it in the pool!

Featuring deep, clear, and immersive audio quality, this speaker utilizes exclusive technologies such as PositionIQ technology and a custom-engineered transducer to deliver exceptional sound. The compact design and utility loop make it easy to carry and store, while the long-lasting Lithium-ion battery provides up to 12 hours of playtime on a single charge. And with the USB-C cable, it only takes approximately 4 hours to fully recharge.

The Bose SoundLink Flex offers seamless connectivity with Bluetooth, allowing you to connect your devices wirelessly up to 30 feet away. It also provides access to virtual assistants like Siri and Google Assistant, and the Bose Connect App allows you to customize settings and receive software updates.

Don't settle for ordinary speakers. Elevate your audio experience with the Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker. Order yours today and enjoy the convenience and superior sound quality wherever you go.

Introducing the Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker! This portable speaker with a built-in microphone is perfect for all your audio needs. Whether you're traveling, enjoying the outdoors, or relaxing by the pool, this wireless waterproof speaker is designed to enhance your experience.

Experience deep, clear, and immersive audio with the Bose SoundLink Flex. Featuring exclusive technologies like PositionIQ and a custom-engineered transducer, this speaker delivers exceptional sound quality that will bring your music to life.

Not only is this speaker waterproof with an IP67 rating, but it also floats on water, making it perfect for pool parties or beach trips. It is also dust-resistant, shock-resistant, corrosion-resistant, and UV light-resistant, ensuring durability and longevity.

The Lithium-ion battery provides up to 12 hours of playtime on a single charge, and with the USB-C cable charging method, it only takes approximately 4 hours to fully recharge. Plus, the built-in microphone allows you to make hands-free calls and access virtual assistants like Siri and Google Assistant.

With the Bose Connect App, you can easily connect and control your speaker, access software updates, and customize settings according to your preferences. Its compact design and utility loop make it incredibly portable and easy to carry around.

Experience the freedom of wireless connectivity with a range of up to 30 feet. Connect your devices seamlessly and enjoy your favorite music anytime, anywhere.

Upgrade your audio experience with the Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker – the perfect companion for your travels, outdoor adventures, and poolside relaxation. Get yours today and immerse yourself in superior sound quality and unbeatable convenience!

Introducing the Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker, the ultimate portable speaker designed to enhance your audio experience wherever you go. With its sleek black design, this speaker is not only stylish but also packed with incredible features to elevate your music listening.

Immerse yourself in deep, clear, and immersive audio with the Bose SoundLink Flex. Powered by exclusive technologies like PositionIQ and a custom-engineered transducer, this portable speaker delivers a premium sound quality that will blow you away. Whether you're relaxing by the pool, enjoying a hike in the great outdoors, or embarking on a travel adventure, this speaker is the perfect companion.

One of the standout features of the SoundLink Flex is its waterproof design. With an IP67 rating, it is fully waterproof and even floats on water, making it ideal for pool parties or beach trips. Not only that, but it is also dust-resistant, shock-resistant, and corrosion-resistant, ensuring its durability even in the toughest conditions. The UV light resistance further protects it from sun damage, making it perfect for outdoor use.

The built-in microphone allows for hands-free calling and also grants you access to virtual assistants like Siri and Google Assistant. Additionally, the Bose Connect App offers app support, allowing you to customize your speaker settings and receive software updates for an enhanced user experience.

Thanks to its compact design and utility loop, the SoundLink Flex is incredibly portable and easy to carry. The long-lasting lithium-ion battery provides up to 12 hours of playtime, and with the USB-C cable charging method, you'll be back to enjoying your favorite tunes in no time.

With a Bluetooth connectivity range of up to 30 feet, you can enjoy seamless wireless streaming from your devices. Whether you're relaxing in your backyard, having a picnic in the park, or hosting a poolside gathering, the SoundLink Flex will keep the party going.

Upgrade your audio experience with the Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker. Don't miss out on this incredible portable speaker that combines style, durability, and impressive sound quality. Get yours today and take your music wherever you go.

Introducing the Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker, the ultimate portable speaker designed for those who crave exceptional audio quality and versatility. This sleek and stylish speaker is perfect for travel, outdoor adventures, and poolside parties. 

Immerse yourself in deep, clear, and immersive audio with the Bose SoundLink Flex. Equipped with exclusive audio technologies, including PositionIQ technology and a custom-engineered transducer, this speaker delivers a rich and captivating sound experience like no other. 

Not only does the SoundLink Flex boast impressive audio quality, but it is also built to withstand any environment. With its IP67 waterproof rating, this speaker can handle splashes, rain, and even floats on water, making it the ideal companion for poolside gatherings. Its dust resistance, shock resistance, and corrosion resistance ensure that it can withstand the rigors of outdoor use. Plus, its UV light resistance means it won't fade or degrade under the sun's rays.

Enjoy up to 12 hours of continuous playtime on a single charge, thanks to the long-lasting lithium-ion battery. And with the USB-C cable charging method, you'll be back to rocking out in no time, with a quick charging time of approximately 4 hours.

The built-in microphone allows for hands-free calling and easy access to virtual assistants like Siri and Google Assistant. Plus, with the Bose Connect App, you can customize your speaker's settings, receive software updates, and enjoy enhanced app support.

Designed with portability in mind, the Bose SoundLink Flex features a compact design that is easy to hold and store. The utility loop adds convenience and ensures your speaker stays secure wherever you go.

With a connection range of up to 30 feet, you can enjoy your favorite tunes without being tethered to your device. Just connect via Bluetooth and let the music fill the air.

Don't compromise on quality or convenience. Experience the Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker today and elevate your audio experience to new heights.

Upgrade your audio experience with the Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker. Get yours today and enjoy the perfect blend of style, performance, and durability.

Introducing the Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker, the ultimate portable speaker that brings your music to life wherever you go. With its sleek black design, this speaker is not only stylish but also packed with incredible features that will enhance your listening experience.

Featuring a built-in microphone, the Bose SoundLink Flex allows you to take calls and enjoy hands-free communication. Whether you're on a conference call or catching up with friends, this speaker ensures crystal-clear sound quality and seamless connectivity.

Not only is it a portable speaker, but it's also a wireless waterproof speaker, making it perfect for travel, outdoor adventures, and even poolside parties. With an IP67 rating, it is completely waterproof and even floats on water, so you can enjoy your favorite tunes worry-free.

The Bose SoundLink Flex is equipped with exclusive audio technologies, including PositionIQ technology and a custom-engineered transducer, delivering deep, clear, and immersive audio. Get ready to be blown away by the powerful bass and pristine clarity that this speaker offers.

Durability is another standout feature of this speaker. It is not only dust-resistant but also shock-resistant and corrosion-resistant, ensuring it can withstand any environment. The UV light resistance ensures that the speaker maintains its sleek black finish even under the sun.

The rechargeable lithium-ion battery provides up to 12 hours of playtime on a single charge, so you can enjoy your music all day long. The USB-C cable charging method ensures quick and convenient charging, with a charging time of approximately 4 hours.

With built-in Siri and Google Assistant access, you can control your speaker with just your voice. Plus, the Bose Connect App allows you to personalize your listening experience, with customizable settings and software updates for added convenience.

The Bose SoundLink Flex is designed with portability in mind. Its compact design and utility loop make it easy to carry and store, while its water resistance and dust resistance ensure it can handle any adventure. Whether you're hiking, camping, or lounging by the pool, take your music with you wherever you go.

Experience wireless freedom and exceptional sound quality with the Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker. Get yours today and elevate your music listening experience like never before.
